note.p: Iron merchant and writer on political subjects. Resident of Liverpool, living at 32 Falkner Square South, 1861, and 10 Abercromby Square, 1871. Author of works advocating the cause of the Confederate states in the American Civil War, 1861–4. Lived in London, 1881, 1891.
Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/2174/281/36), 1861 (RG9/2686/97/41), 1871 (RG10/3783/66/20), 1881 (RG11/30/27/ 31), 1891 (RG12/21/95/76)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.co.uk, accessed 30 August 2018)

note.term: works advocating the cause of the Confederate states in the American Civil War
